JOB.DESCRIPTION: Deletes conditions older than 15 days

This job uses hadoop distcp utility to move the article datasets to PROD1 from GRAVEL cluster. The network connection timeout may occur resulting the distcp utility to fail. The job utility retries to establish connection until the max retries exceed. The job returns a NON ZERO code if there are no article dataset available on GRAVEL cluster.

This job does extract data records from WorldcatCrossref table on HBase system. It generates the key value pairs by comparing the originalOclcNumber and masterOclcNumber. The job application/process does interact with HBase system. At anytime, the network exception timeout may occur resulting the job to fail. This is known issue due to nature of the distributed and parallel computing. When the HBase connection become available, the timeout may occur and the job retries until the max retries are reached.

The mapreduce application job does process the input OCN records key value pairs. It does compare the old work Ids/OCNs to new input OCNs/workIds. The job requires the input data from the predecessor job wcatxrefglimir to run successfully.
MapReduce job operates exclusively on input type combine/sort on the old workid values, new clustering from the office of research to generate pairing new work Ids and old work Ids.
MapReduce job operates exclusively on input type combine the old workid values, new clustering from the office of research to generate the <oclc, oldworkid, newworkid> output.

MapReduce job generates the output of list OCNs, separated by tab space, and emits a key-value pair to generate values < P| X indicator, MasterOclcNumber >.These are list of OCNs associated to update with the work Ids.
MapReduce job operates exclusively on the input type combine/sort on the old workid values, new clustering from the office of research to generate pairing new work Ids and old work Ids.

JOB.CMDLINE: ePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweep ; stagingPath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepStaging ; donePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepDone ; hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${ePath}" ; hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${stagingPath}" ; hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${donePath}" ; subDir=`hadoop fs -ls "${stagingPath}" | awk '{ print $8}'| grep . | head -1` ; subDir=`basename "${subDir}"` ; if [ -z "$subDir" ] ; then exit 99 ; fi
JOB.INSTREAM_JCL: ePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweep stagingPath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepStaging donePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepDone hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${ePath}" hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${stagingPath}" hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${donePath}" subDir=`hadoop fs -ls "${stagingPath}" | awk '{ print $8}'| grep . | head -1` subDir=`basename "${subDir}"` if [ ! -z "$subDir" ] then exit 99 fi

JOB.DESCRIPTION: setup LCMPT and LCDGT input from Esweep
JOB.CMDLINE: ePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweep ; stagingPath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepStaging ; donePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepDone ; directoryPath=`hadoop fs -ls "${stagingPath}" | sort -r -k 3 | awk '{ print $8}' | grep . | head -1` ; date=$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M") ; hadoop fs -rm -r "${ePath}/*" ; hadoop fs -cp "${directoryPath}"/* "${ePath}" ; directoryName=$(basename "$directoryPath") ; hadoop fs -mv "${directoryPath}" "${donePath}/${date}"
JOB.INSTREAM_JCL: ePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweep stagingPath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepStaging donePath=/user/ingestops/Authority/remoteLoadLOC/esweepDone directoryPath=`hadoop fs -ls "${stagingPath}" | sort -r -k 3 | awk '{ print $8}' | grep . | head -1` date=$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M") hadoop fs -rm -r "${ePath}/*" hadoop fs -cp "${directoryPath}"/* "${ePath}" directoryName=$(basename "$directoryPath") hadoop fs -mv "${directoryPath}" "${donePath}/${date}"

Creates a Solr collection for indexing from ODEP:IrtAuthorityVariantMapping.
The name of the collection is odep-bci-authority-variant-maping-<xxx>.
An alias in Solr, 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING', is subsequently created that points to this collection.

Indexes records from ODEP:IrtAuthorityVariantMapping HBase table into the Solr collection identified by the alias, 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING'.
Removes Solr collection identified by the alias 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping', switches the alias to point to the newly indexed collection, then removes the alias 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING'.
An alias in Solr, 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING', is subsequently created that points to this collection.

Loads authority authorized terms and equivalencies into ODEP:IrtAuthorityVariantMapping HBase table.
The sources of the records are the "Authority" and "Equivalency" HBase tables in the default namespace.
Variants are extracted from the 4xx fields of the CDF record in the Authority table. Authorized terms are extracted from the 1xx field of the CDF record in the Authority table. Equivalencies are loaded from the Equivalency HBase table.

Loads authority authorized terms and equivalencies into ODEP:IrtAuthorityVariantMapping HBase table.
The sources of the records are the "Authority" and "Equivalency" HBase tables in the default namespace.
Variants are extracted from the 4xx fields of the CDF record in the Authority table. Authorized terms are extracted from the 1xx field of the CDF record in the Authority table. Equivalencies are loaded from the Equivalency HBase table.

Creates a Solr collection for indexing from ODEP:IrtAuthorityVariantMapping.
The name of the collection is odep-bci-authority-variant-maping-<xxx>.
An alias in Solr, 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING', is subsequently created that points to this collection.

Indexes records from ODEP:IrtAuthorityVariantMapping HBase table into the Solr collection identified by the alias, 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING'.
Removes Solr collection identified by the alias 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping', switches the alias to point to the newly indexed collection, then removes the alias 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING'.
An alias in Solr, 'odep-bci-authority-variant-mapping-LOADING', is subsequently created that points to this collection.

JOB.DESCRIPTION: Differential Backup: pgBackRest copies only those database cluster files that have changed since the last full backup. pgBackRest restores a differential backup by copying all of the files in the chosen differential backup and the appropriate unchanged files from the previous full backup. The advantage of a differential backup is that it requires less disk space than a full backup, however, the differential backup and the full backup must both be valid to restore the differential backup.

JOB.DESCRIPTION:
Extracts all bib record xml from Worldcat that meets the following criteria:
* Does not contain a FAST heading * Has an LC subject heading
The bib records that meet this criteria are written to a flat file with two fields, c001 and the xml document extracted from Worldcat sans the following fields:
* 1xx * 2xx's (though 245s are retained) * 3xx * 7xx * 8xx * any field that has a subfield 6.
Extracts all FAST bib record xml from Worldcat and writes them to a flat file with two fields, c001 and the xml document extracted from Worldcat.

Accepts a file (specified on the command line) consisting of one or more cdf xml records and creates an output file (in a location specified on the command lline) consisting of equivalent marc records. This configuration is specific for FAST.

Accepts a file (specified on the command line) consisting of one or more cdf xml records and creates an output file (in a location specified on the command lline) consisting of equivalent marc records. This configuration is specific for FAST.

FastOnePercentWorldcatBibExtract, scans the Worldcat HBase table for bib records. Those meeting the scan criteria are written to HDFS for the second job in this folder (WorldcatCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records) to use as input.
WorldcatCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records, reads the output from the predecessor job and converts the input to Marc 8 format which is then written to HDFS.

FullWorldcatBibExtract, scans the Worldcat HBase table for bib records. Those meeting the scan criteria are written to HDFS for the second job in this folder (WorldcatCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records) to use as input.
WorldcatCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records, reads the output from the predecessor job and converts the input to Marc 8 format which is then written to HDFS.

LcAuthorityExtract, scans the Authority HBase table for LC records. Those records meeting the scan and filter criteria are written to HDFS for the second job in this folder (AuthorityCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records) to use as input.
AuthorityCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records, reads the output from the predecessor job and converts the input to Marc 8 format which is then written to HDFS.
AuthorityCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records, reads the output from the predecessor job and converts the input to Marc 8 format which is then written to HDFS.

FastMostRecentVersionsAuthorityHistoryExtract, scans the AuthorityHistory HBase table for FAST records, groups them by their c001, and retains only the most recent version of that record. Those retained records are written to HDFS for the second job in this folder (AuthorityCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records) to use as input.

SMART_FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: Extracts cdf xml bibliographic records from Worldcat that contain LC subject headings and converts them to Marc 8 format on HDFS.

JOB.DESCRIPTION: FastlessFullWorldcatBibExtract, scans the Worldcat HBase table for bib records. Those meeting the scan criteria are written to HDFS for the second job in this folder (WorldcatCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records) to use as input.
WorldcatCdfXmlRecordsToMarc8Records, reads the output from the predecessor job and converts the input to Marc 8 format which is then written to HDFS.
Tries to shutdown all Emma holdings Engine jobs gracefully. If unsuccessful, it force kills them
